p: Viruses known to cause encephalitis worldwide are herpesviruses, arboviruses and enteroviruses [ 1]. Arboviruses are the leading cause of encephalitis worldwide [ 2]. In developed countries, herpes simplex virus type 1 (HSV-1) is the leading cause of sporadic encephalitis in adults, while Varicella zoster virus (VZV) is responsible for up to 22% of pediatric cases [ 1].
